FuncDef: The display multicast bandwidth command displays the parameter values related to multicast program bandwidth.
CLIs: display multicast bandwidth [ name <list-name> | [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] [ source <source-address> ] group <group-address> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the multicast program list.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the VPN instance of which the multicast program bandwidth is displayed. vpn-instance-name specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies the address of the multicast source, that is, the multicast source of the multicast programs.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the address of the multicast group, that is, the multicast group of the multicast programs.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Examples: Multicast Bandwidth Table of VPN-Instance: public net
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The description of the display multicast bandwidth command is as follows:
If the list-name parameter is specified, the bandwidth of only this multicast program list is displayed.If the source-address parameter is specified, the bandwidth of only the multicast program list of this multicast source is displayed.If the group-address parameter is specified, the bandwidth of only the multicast program list of this multicast group is displayed.If the vpn-instanceor source source-address parameter is specified, the group group-address parameter must be specified.

Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
